thread.title: Salma Hayek calls for male stars to get pay cut

title: Salma Hayek calls for male stars to get pay cut
text:
Salma Hayek calls for male stars to get pay cut 2:40pm IST - 00:37
Mexican-American actress Salma Hayek, a vocal campaigner against sexual harassment in the movie industry, says male stars should get less pay as way to even things up with chronically underpaid women. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
